items.title: Usage with decorators and floating label

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

description.text: Specifies class name to append to the base element.

props.name: as
props.docblock: Specifies base element for the control component.

description.text: Specifies base element for the control component.

props.name: onChange
props.docblock: Specifies function that is triggered on input value change.

description.text: Specifies function that is triggered on input value change.

props.name: defaultValue
props.docblock: Specifies default value of the input component.

description.text: Specifies default value of the input component.

props.name: value
props.docblock: Specifies current value of the input component.

description.text: Specifies current value of the input component.

props.name: id
props.docblock: Specifies id of the control component.

description.text: Specifies id of the control component.

props.name: controlClassName
props.docblock: Specifies class name for the control component.

description.text: Specifies class name for the control component.

props.name: size
props.docblock: Specifies size for the control component.

description.text: Specifies size for the control component.

props.name: leadingElement
props.docblock: Specifies leading element to display for the input component.

description.text: Specifies leading element to display for the input component.

props.name: trailingElement
props.docblock: Specifies trailing element to display for the input component.

description.text: Specifies trailing element to display for the input component.

props.name: floatingLabel
props.docblock: Specifies floating label to display for the input component.

description.text: Specifies floating label to display for the input component.

props.name: plaintext
props.docblock: Specifies whether to render input as plain text.

description.text: Specifies whether to render input as plain text.

props.name: isValid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display control in valid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display control in valid state, this affects styling.

props.name: isInvalid
props.docblock: Specifies whether to display control in invalid state, this affects styling.

description.text: Specifies whether to display control in invalid state, this affects styling.

props.name: autoResize
props.docblock: Only for `as="textarea"`. Specifies whether the input can be resized according to the height of content.

description.text: Only for `as="textarea"`. Specifies whether the input can be resized according to the height of content.
